Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2009 02:27PM gigigigi wrote: I know how you feel and have gone through the same route.  I was also diagnosed with DCIS in 2007and had a lumpectomy done in March that year.  Margin not cleared and had a mestectomy done in June.    I went through both surgery and same as you I nevre had general annesthia done before that.  I was also very worried.   To be honest,  the operation was not bad at all.  I was prescribed some pain killer but did not take even one.  I had some tightness on my breast but not sore or anything.  On a scale of 1 to 10, the pain level after the operation is about 4.  I felt tired though right after.   You will need to take a lot of rest to build up your energy again.  God bless.  G
